Pierre Fakhoury (amụrụ na Dabou, Côte d'Ivoire ) bụ onye Lebanon na Ivory Coast na-ewu ụlọ. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Architecture na Tournai, Belgium
Ọrụ ya a ma ama gụnyere Basilica of Our Lady of Peace na Yamoussoukro, Côte d'Ivoire. Kemgbe afọ 1983, Fakhoury etinyela aka na mbugharị nke isi obodo Côte d'Ivoire site na Abidjan gaa Yamoussoukro.
